answers.answer: It does not, those sweetners are chemicially made to give the taste of sugar, but not the effects of it.  I have been drinking diet drinks since I was a kid and have never had one (except the ones that use fruit juice in their mix) ever raise my bs levels.

question: Just wanted to be sure if the diet pepsi doesnt affect the blood sugar in diabetes type 1 even if it contains sweeteners(aspartam and saccharine)??
title: diet pepsi and blood sugar
